name: UNHALLOWED: THE CABIN
description: Every hint has led to disappointment. Every clue has brought you to a dead end. Your failure to find your brother and his expecting wife is starting to wear on you, and desperation begins to set in. Perhaps they took an unannounced vacation to the family cabin, the one where you spent your childhoods- the one deep in the woods, far flung...
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: i7 Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia 1060 Storage: 4 GB available space Sound Card: Basic
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: i7 Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: 1070 Storage: 4 GB available space Sound Card: Surround Sound
